message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $130.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm not comfortable going that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $125.
I'm still a bit above my budget, can you meet me at $115?
I'm getting close to your budget, Bob, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $122.
I'm getting a bit frustrated, I really want this product, but I'm not willing to go above $118. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand your frustration, Bob, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'll meet you halfway between our last offers and sell the product to you for $120.50.
I'm not sure if I can go that high, but I'm willing to meet you halfway from $120.50 to $119. Can you consider that?
I'm not willing to go that low, Bob. I'll meet you halfway from $120.50 to $119 and sell the product to you for $119.75.
I'm not willing to go above $118, and I'm starting to get a bit worried that I'll end up buying it from John for $150. Can you seriously consider meeting me at $118?
